objectives.details: I am seeking a challenging position to enhance my coding skills. While I may lack experience and have much to learn, I am eager to embrace new challenges and acquire knowledge that will help me grow in many areas. I am fully committed to contributing to the development of various systems.

coursework.head: Programming & Software Development
coursework.details: Computer Programming,  Algorithm Design, Programming Methodology, Programming Language Principles, Software Engineering, Software Development Methodologies

coursework.head: Data Structures & Systems
coursework.details: Introduction to Data Structure, Embedded System, Database System, Software Engineering, Computer System Architectures , Computer Networks, Operating Systems

coursework.head: Other
coursework.details: Web Application Development ,Bioinformatics, Introduction to Digital Image, Natural Language Processing System, High Performance Achitecture

projects.name: Kolla OpenStack Installation Helper — July 2025
projects.details: Developed a Vite + React web application that serves as a beginner-friendly guide for deploying OpenStack using Kolla Ansible, covering the full process from network setup to post-deployment configuration. Leveraged AI-assisted content generation to create clear instructions and visual aids, simplifying complex deployment steps for first-time users and enhancing accessibility to cloud infrastructure automation.

projects.name: Natural Language Processing Project — May 2025
projects.details: Developed an AI chatbot web application capable of answering questions and recommending accommodations based on Booking.com data, leveraging RAG on Gemini.

projects.name: Software Engineering Project — April 2025
projects.details: Collaborated in a team to develop a room rental web application, focusing on backend development, refactoring folder structures, and managing deployment processes for the team.

projects.name: Computer Networks Project — April 2025
projects.details: Developed a web-based chat application, implementing the frontend using React and TypeScript with AI assistance, and independently building the backend using Express.js and TypeScript with Socket.io for real-time communication.

projects.name: Software Development Practice Final Project — April 2025
projects.details: Implemented Api for reserveation co-working space using Express.js and JavaScript

projects.name: To-Do List Web App
projects.details: to-do list app built with Vue.js version and ReactJS version to manage user interactions and app state, integrated with MockAPI.

projects.name: User Management Web App
projects.details: Implemented full CRUD operations using Express.js for backend routing and PostgreSQL for data storage and retrieval.

projects.name: Programming Methodology Final Project — May 2023
projects.details: Implemented a game as a final project using Java. The project included the knowledge of the uses of OOP and JavaFX

projects.name: Computer Engineering Essentials Project — April 2023
projects.details: Collaborated with a team to develop a fully functional website using HTML, JavaScript, and DynamoDB, demonstrating proficiency in REST APIs, frontend, and backend development.

technologies.details: C++, Python, TypeScript, Go, Rust, Java, Scala
AWS, Vercel, Github Actions, CloudFlare, Terraform, Ansible, Openstack

details: Designed and implemented a private cloud prototype using OpenStack on self-hosted physical servers and virtual machines.
Deployed and tested the environment using Kolla Ansible for automation and orchestration.
Developed a beginner-friendly web guide for Kolla Ansible deployment, with AI-assisted content generation.
Focused on Linux system administration, Ansible automation, and OpenStack operations.
Gained hands-on experience in installing, configuring, and managing OpenStack services in a lab environment.
